verses.content: Chun, Pharisaihai le Dân inchûk- tirtuhai laia mi tuhai amanih Jerusalema inthawka hunghai chu a kuomah an hung inkhâwm a.
Chuonghai chun a închûktir aṭhenhaiin kut bala bei an fâk an lo hmuh tah a. Bal ti hi sâwplo tina a nih.
(Pharisaihai thurosie chu an pawm tlat leiin an kut fâitaka an sâwp naw chun an fâk ngai si nawh a.
Chun, dâwr hmuna inthawk an inlâwi khawmin an insil naw chun an fâk ngai nawh a. Chun, thu dang tamtak pawm tlat ding an lâksâwnghai chu a um a, nohai, bêlhai, sumbêlhai sâwp hai ang hi.)
Chuongchun, Pharisaihai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chun, “Iengdinga i închûktirhai hin ruolhlui thurosie ang peia um loa kut bala bei an fâk el hlak am a na?” tiin an indawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Isai hin nangni mi vervêkhai thu a lo hrillâwk dik zet el– ‘Hi hairawi hin an bauin an mîn pâk a, An lungril ruok chun an mi hlat sih a.
An inchûktirnaa mihriem thupêkhai an inchûktir leiin, An mi biek khawm hi a thlâwn el a nih,’ ti ziek ang khan.
Pathien thupêkhai chu lung- kham loin, mihriem thurosie chu in chel tlat a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin an kuom- ah, “Nangni thurosiehai in pawm theina dingin Pathien thupêkhai chu in dit naw hi, rem chu in hriet ngawt hi aw!
Mosiein, ‘I nu le pa chawimawi rawh,’ ‘Tukhawm a nu amanih, a pa amanih hrilse taphawt chu thi mawl raw se,’ a ti sih a;
nangni ruok chun hieng hin in ti hlak a, ‘Mîn a nu amanih, a pa amani kuomah, I mi sawrna ding hi Korban a ni tah,’ a ti chun, (chu chu Pathien kuoma pêk tina a nih),
a nu amanih, a pa amani ta dingin iengkhawm a thawpêk in phal ta ngai nawh a;
in thurosie peksâwng hin Pathien thu chu in baw hmang hlak a nih; chuong ang chu tamtak in thaw hlak,” a ta.
Chun, mipui chu a ko nâwk a, an kuomah, “In rêngin ka thu hi lo ngâi seng unla, a ngâi lo thiem ta u;
Mihriem puotienga inthawka a phîng sûnga lût ama sukthieng naw thei iengkhawm a um nawh, mihriem phîng sûnga inthawka hung suokhai chu mihriem sukthieng nawtu an ni lem a nih,” a ta.
[Tukhawm hrietna dinga na nei chun hre raw se.]
Chun, mipuihai chu ina a lûtsan hnungin, a inchûktirhaiin tekhithu chu ama an indawn fel a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Nangni khawm chuong ang lâwma hrietna nei naw in ni maw? Hi hi in hriet naw maw? Iengkhawm puo- tienga inthawka mihriem sûnga lût po chun ama a sukthiengnaw thei nawh;
a lungrila lût loin, a phîngah a lût a, inhnâwmnaah a suok lem hlak leiin, ti hi?” a ta. (Chu chu fâkding tin rêng fâk a thieng, a tina a nih.)
Chun, ama bâwkin, “Mihriem phîng sûnga inthawka hung suok chun, chu tak chun mihriem a sukthieng naw hlak a nih.
Sûng tienga um mihriem lungrila inthawkhai chun, ngaituona suol dâm a hung suok hlak nghâl a; inditna dâm, inrûkna dâm, tuol- thatna dâm, uirena dâm,
inhnarna dâm, suolna dâm, hlêmna dâm, hurna dâm, îtsîkna dâm, hrilsietna dâm, chapona dâm le invêtna dâm hi;
chuong suolhai po po chu sûngtienga inthawkin a hung suok a, mihriem chu a sukthieng naw hlak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, a tho a, chutaka inthawk chun Tura le Sidon bielah a fe tah a, chun, inah a lût a, tu ihriet khawm a nuom nawh a; nisienlakhawm, ân thup thei si nawh.
Chuongchun, nuhmei pakhat naunu khawhri inthieng naw iman nei chun a chanchin a lo hriet a, a ke bulah a va bawkkhup nghâl tah a.
Chu nuhmei chu Grik mi a na, insiengna tieng chu Surophoiniki mi a nih. Ama chun a naunu sûnga khawhri hnawt dawk dingin a ngên a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Nauhai chu khawp hmasa phawt raw hai se, nauhai bei lâkpêk a, uihai kuoma pêk a mawi nawh ie,” a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, ni chu a nih; nisienlakhawm, dawkân hnuoia uihai khawmin nauhai bei nâwi chu an fâk hlak annâwm,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “I thu hril lei chun fe ta raw le; khawhri chu i naunu sûnga inthawkin a suok tah,” a ta.
Chun, a ina chun a fe tah a, a nau chu khawhri isuoksan zoa khuma zâl a va hmu tah a.
Chun, Tura rama inthawkin a suok nâwk a, Sidon khuo sirin Dekapoli ram fe thleng peiin Galili dîl chu a tlung tah a.
Chun, mi pakhat nasêt, ṭawng khawm ṭawng fel thei lo hi a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a, a chunga a kut innghat dingin an ngên a.
Chun, ama chun mipui laia chu, a khât chauin a tumin a ṭhuoi a, a kutpârhaiin a nakuo chu a khîkpêk a, chil a sâk a, a lei a them pêk a.
Chun, vân tieng nghain ân thuok huoi a, a kuomah, “Ephatha,” a ta. Chu chu, “Lo inhawng rawh,” tina a nih.
Chuongchun, a nahai chu a hung inhawng a, a lei khitna khawm chu a hung insût a, chiengtakin a ṭawng thei tah a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah tukhawm hril lo ding a ti tlat a; nisienlakhawm, a khap nasa deu leh, an khêk vêl pui nasa hman hlak a.
“Ama chun iengkim ṭhatakin a thawh a; nasêt dâm a sukvarpêk a, ṭawng thei naw dâm khawm ân ṭawngtir hlak,” an ta, mak an ti nasa bêk bêk a.
